description:
A good emergency bivy sack, the metalized fabric reflects up to 90% of your radiated body heat. It's waterproof, windproof, and extremely light.

  • Made of vacuum-metalized polyethylene
  • Stuff sack is made of silnylon
  • Staff sack has a whistle integrated into the drawcord, and the cord can be used as tinder in an emergency
name: Survive Outdoors Longer Emergency Bivvy XL w/Rescue Whistle
